Performer:
Kiritake Kanroku (see also Yoshida Kanroku) (桐竹勘緑)

Alternate Name: Yoshida Kanroku (吉田勘緑)

Dates: '1979-1986/11'

Specialty: Puppeteer

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)


– Click image to view.


Performances as Puppeteer:

August 1984: The Murder in Revenge

July 1979: The Story of the Morning Glory

December 1979 Bunraku Kanshō Kyōshitsu: Sugawara's Secrets of Calligraphy

February 1980: The Go Game Strategy

April 1980: The Old Tale of Kusunoki

May 1980: The Bloodshed at Ise

July 1980: The Bloodshed at Ise

September 1980: The New Usuyuki Story

July 1981: The Young Cherry Tree
